TopicTitle: (Question) Override for the resource usage on a part [RCS thruster]

Articles.Content: I am using an RCS thruster that utilizes electricity as its resource, which makes it very useful on my electric heavy crafts, the only problem is that in this case, it is using infinity/sec electricity. I am assuming that has something to do with the way the resource calculations are perpetrated for an RCS thruster, namely that it is something like thrust = isp/mass, and electricity has a mass of 0 in this case, so it can't do it. I have looked at the wiki and it doesn't list any of the RCS thruster specific properties, so I am really left wondering. Does anyone else know?

I'm having this issue too. Wish I knew how to deal with it!

Update: I fixed this issue by creating a new resource (see squad/resources) and giving it a density. It needs a density.

Edited August 1, 2015 by adamkdean
You could just make a new resource and a converter to convert ElectricCharge to your new resource add alittle density = *** to your new resource ?
